title: Template Management & Generation
description: Capabilities for listing, inspecting, and generating landing page scenarios from templates

requirements.title: Template availability
requirements.description: Expose at least one template (saas-landing-page) via CLI/API for listing, inspection, and generation
requirements.notes: Implement CLI commands: landing-manager template list, landing-manager template show <name>

requirements.title: Template metadata
requirements.description: Template metadata includes required sections, optional sections, and metrics hooks
requirements.notes: Metadata should include: sections (hero, features, pricing, etc.), metrics hooks (page_view, click, conversion), customization schema

requirements.title: Single-command generation
requirements.description: Create new landing-page scenario with one CLI command without manual file editing

requirements.title: Runnable locally
requirements.description: Generated landing-page scenario runs locally (frontend + Go API) with single startup command
requirements.notes: Generated scenario should work with: vrooli scenario start <generated-name> or make start
